name: Healthyfied Chili Parmesan Mayo Dip
description: Dive into a guilt-free indulgence with our Healthyfied Chili Parmesan Mayo Dip, perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. This flavor-packed dip combines the creamy texture of Kewpie mayo with the boldness of Parmesan and the spicy kick of chili oil for a healthy twist on your favorite recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Measure and prepare all ingredients: 1 Tbsp of Kewpie Mayo, 1 tablespoon of Parmesan, 0.5 tablespoon of water, and 0.25 teaspoon of chili oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the Kewpie Mayo, Parmesan, water, and chili oil until you achieve a smooth and homogenous mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust the seasoning of the dip according to your preference. If you desire more heat, add a little more chili oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Refrigerate the dip for about 10 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together beautifully.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chilled with your favorite low-carb vegetables or healthy snacks. Enjoy your Healthyfied Chili Parmesan Mayo Dip!
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
